overview: Oh boy, that’s a tough one… is there plot on this disc? Well, kind of. There is a plot of sorts, but this really is more of a compilation disc than anything else. There is plot for each scene, but it’s never part of a cohesive whole. It’s like watching the Club Massacre from the beginning of Blade, the boarding of the plane from Passenger 57, and the final inning from Major League on a Wesley Snipes compilation disc. Is there a plot? Sure, but you don’t see much of it. I’m just going to address the plots in the scene breakdown; it’s really not worth it from here.
title: Deep Inside Ginger Lynn
